scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive
scripts.start:uat: HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=443 HTTPS=true REACT_APP_SDK_URL=https://api-uat.iph.sa/iph/ REACT_APP_GA_CODE=UA-123 npm start
scripts.build:stage: npm run build-css && REACT_APP_VERSION=`date -u +%Y%m%d-%H%M` REACT_APP_SDK_URL=https://api-stg.iph.sa/iph/ REACT_APP_GA_CODE=UA-102567610-1 react-scripts build && mv build iph-ui-stg-`date -u +%Y-%m-%d`
scripts.build:qa: npm run build-css && REACT_APP_VERSION=`date -u +%Y%m%d-%H%M` REACT_APP_SDK_URL=https://api-qa.iph.sa/iph/ REACT_APP_GA_CODE=UA-102567610-3 react-scripts build && mv build iph-ui-qa-`date -u +%Y-%m-%d`
